channel.title: [pi] Some items wont equip & attack glitch
channel.description:
Today i decided to give PI a go. i got a nice base and started to code it. i let a select few from my original server on to help me, the first thing they noticed was most of the new items wont equip. i checked to see if they were in items.cfg, they're not. So i added them in, and compiled. errors and wrecked the server. and also, when i attack some npc's or other players the charachter moves away, noclipping through everything & just doesnt stop
the base is Orical-X Any help?

item.title: [pi] Some items wont equip & attack glitch
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

walkTo method and createGroundItem for dropping and pathfinding fixes. I posted a snippet in my topic release on how to fix the new items.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] Some items wont equip & attack glitch

item.title: [pi] Some items wont equip & attack glitch
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

[quote=“Vexillum, post:8, topic:401556”][quote author=nsfpure link=topic=498615.msg3646690#msg3646690 date=1309438366]

Asshole_rule is selling the fix.

im not paying for the fix. i’ll find it myself
[/quote]

Goodluck.
I wouldn’t use orical x for a base…[/quote]

i wanted to take snippets out of it but no other pi bases work for me, they all say there’s a blind excpetion

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Some items wont equip & attack glitch
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

I used tabs, and I got compiler errors and run errors. I’m new to PI so could someone please tell me how to fix the pathfinding. And someone helping me to fix the items said if something is changes in the cfg folder it has to be mirrored in the src folder? But anyway, anyone know how to fix these?

Read full topic

Lol Vex, Asshole_rule didn’t know how to fix the pathfinding, and for the items.cfg did you use spaces or tabs?
